nodes.id: 上海市第一中级人民法院

zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院

location.zh-cn: 上海市长宁区虹桥路1200号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上海市的一所中级人民法院，于1995年7月1日在原上海市中级人民法院“撤一建二”的基础上建立。
description.en: An intermediate people's court in Shanghai, People's Republic of China, established on July 1, 1995, based on the division of the former Shanghai Intermediate People's Court.

nodes.id: 陆卫民

description.zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院院长，一级高级法官。
description.en: President of the Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People's Court, First-class Senior Judge.

nodes.id: 上海市高级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 上海市的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ in Shanghai.

nodes.id: 上海市人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 上海市的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local organ of state power in Shanghai.

nodes.id: 上海市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 上海市人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 上海市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

nodes.id: 上海市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院和上海市第二中级人民法院的前身，于1995年7月被分拆。
description.en: The predecessor of the Shanghai No. 1 and No. 2 Intermediate People's Courts, which was split in July 1995.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行上海分行原行长。

nodes.id: 上海市第二中级人民法院

zh-cn: 上海市第二中级人民法院

relationships.source: 陆卫民
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 陆卫民担任上海市第一中级人民法院院长。
description.en: Lu Weimin serves as the President of the Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市高级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院的上诉法院和业务上级是上海市高级人民法院。
description.en: The court of appeal and professional superior for the Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People's Court is the Shanghai High People's Court.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院在组织上受上海市人民代表大会领导。
description.en: The Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People's Court is organizationally subordinate to the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院在组织上受上海市人民代表大会常务委员会领导。
description.en: The Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People's Court is organizationally subordinate to the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 上海市人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院经上海市人民代表大会常务委员会批准设立。
description.en: The Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People's Court was established with the approval of the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院接受中国共产党上海市委员会的领导。
description.en: The Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People's Court is subordinate to the leadership of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 上海市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院是在原上海市中级人民法院“撤一建二”的基础上建立的。
description.en: The Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People's Court was established based on the division of the former Shanghai Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 上海市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市第二中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 上海市第二中级人民法院是在原上海市中级人民法院“撤一建二”的基础上建立的。
description.en: The Shanghai No. 2 Intermediate People's Court was established based on the division of the former Shanghai Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 上海市浦东新区人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

relationships.source: 上海市徐汇区人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

relationships.source: 上海市闵行区人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

relationships.source: 上海市松江区人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

relationships.source: 上海市奉贤区人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

relationships.source: 上海市金山区人民法院
relationships.target: 上海市第一中级人民法院

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 周正毅

description.zh-cn: 对周正毅案作出一审判决，以操纵证券交易价格罪和虚报注册资本罪判处其有期徒刑三年。
description.en: Issued a first-instance verdict in the Zhou Zhengyi case, sentencing him to three years in prison for manipulating securities trading prices and fraudulent registration of capital.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 力拓案

description.zh-cn: 对力拓案作出一审判决，涉案人员因非国家工作人员受贿罪、侵犯商业秘密罪获刑。
description.en: Issued a first-instance verdict in the Rio Tinto case, sentencing the individuals involved for accepting bribes as non-state employees and infringing on commercial secrets.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 杨振超

description.zh-cn: 对原安徽省人民政府副省长杨振超案作出一审判决，以受贿罪、贪污罪、滥用职权罪数罪并罚，判处无期徒刑。
description.en: Issued a first-instance verdict in the case of Yang Zhenchao, former vice governor of Anhui Provincial People's Government, sentencing him to life imprisonment for bribery, embezzlement, and abuse of power.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 戴海波

description.zh-cn: 对上海市政府原副秘书长戴海波受贿、隐瞒境外存款案作出一审判决，决定执行有期徒刑九年。
description.en: Issued a first-instance verdict in the case of Dai Haibo, former deputy secretary-general of the Shanghai Municipal Government, for bribery and concealment of overseas deposits, sentencing him to nine years in prison.

relationships.source: 上海快鹿投资集团
relationships.target: “快鹿系”集资诈骗案

description.zh-cn: 上海快鹿投资集团相关的“快鹿系”公司涉及非法集资诈骗。
description.en: Companies related to the Shanghai Kuailu Investment Group's 'Kuailu series' were involved in illegal fundraising fraud.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: “快鹿系”集资诈骗案

description.zh-cn: 对“快鹿系”集资诈骗案进行一审。
description.en: Conducted the first-instance trial for the 'Kuailu series' fundraising fraud case.

relationships.source: 黄一川
relationships.target: 2018年上海市世界外国语小学砍人事件

description.zh-cn: 黄一川是2018年上海市世界外国语小学砍人事件的行凶者。
description.en: Huang Yichuan was the perpetrator of the 2018 Shanghai World Foreign Language Primary School stabbing.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 黄一川

description.zh-cn: 对“6·28”浦北路持刀杀人案一审宣判，以故意杀人罪判处黄一川死刑。
description.en: Pronounced the first-instance verdict in the '6.28' Pubei Road fatal stabbing case, sentencing Huang Yichuan to death for intentional homicide.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院
relationships.target: 顾国明

description.zh-cn: 对工商银行上海分行原行长顾国明受贿案作出判决，以受贿罪判处无期徒刑。
description.en: Issued a verdict in the bribery case of Gu Guoming, former head of ICBC's Shanghai branch, sentencing him to life imprisonment for bribery.
